QuestData.Title: Bearers of the Plague
QuestData.Description: You show courage coming to the Ghostlands, $n. There is much work to be done here and not enough brave souls to do it.$B$BI've a thankless task to offer you, should you have the inclination to aid our cause. The very wildlife in this land has been tainted by the plague and we must stop it from spreading. Hunt the ghostclaw lynxes to the east and south of here and return when you've slain enough of them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Farstrider Sedina at the Farstrider Enclave in the Ghostlands wants you to slay 10 Ghostclaw Lynxes.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you completed the task I asked of you, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $N. It's important that the plague doesn't spread to the healthy wildlife in Eversong. I have more work for you if you're looking for something to do.
